"Guiden": "If you're ever struggling, remember my advice to you."
"Let's both keep trying our best."
"Hey, there you are."
"Hm, good to see you haven't neglected your daily training. You seem to have gotten stronger than when last we met."
"You're plenty strong as you are now."
"However, I think you pale in comparison to your potential."
"You can become even stronger. Why not seek out even greater heights?"
"There's more than one method of getting stronger. I want you to challenge yourself to defy your own limits."
"I greatly look forward to seeing you grow into your potential."
"I understand. Come back when you're more interested. You'll always be welcome."
"It surprised me to see how much you've achieved in such a short amount of time."
"Just seeing you stand there really puts into perspective how far you've come."
"Keep striving to improve like that. Prepare yourself for the next battle."
"Going back earlier, what do you think about how far you've come?"
"Are you satisfied with where you're at, or do you feel like there's something you're missing?"
"Actually, when ARKS surpass their limits of growth, there is a way they can improve yet further still."
"Only, this kind of growth isn't something that influences your Power Level."
"Are you curious about what it is?"
"For ARKS who have mastered a class, and they yet still surpass their limits, a \"symbol\" appears."
"This \"symbol\" might not show up for you, but why not try it out anyways as part of your training?"
"I see. Well, if there comes a time when you desire even further strength, seek me out again."
"So you do want more power. Very well, then."
"Well, next let's talk about breaking the limits of weapons."
"Well? Do you like the sound of that?"
"Arms Refiners are very rare, but you can have them created at an Item Lab."
"You will need them for strengthening your weapons beyond their limits."
"Confirm the required materials and go try to have one forged yourself."
"I see. Well, if there comes a time when you desire even further strength, seek me out again."
"If you're ever struggling, remember my advice to you."
"Let's both keep trying our best."
